verses.text: Ix yalanxi Jehová d'ayin icha tic:
Ach anima, ixic q'uelan d'a stojolal lum tzalquixtac yic Seir. Tzalan in lolonel d'a yib'anh luum.

Tzalan icha tic: A Jehová Yajal tz'alan icha tic: Ex cajan ex d'a tzalquixtac yic Seir, a in svala' to ay cot voval d'ayex, ol vak'och yaelal d'a eyib'anh, ol vak'can tz'inan e chonhab', ol mak'joccanem lanhnajoc.
A juntzanh e chonhab', ol in satel d'a junelnhej. Ol vak'can tz'inan. Icha chi' ol aj snachajel eyuuj to a in ton Jehová in svutej icha chi'
Yujto ayexnhejoch ajk'olal d'a chonhab' Israel, e milnaccham eb' ayic ayoch syaelal eb' yuj smul.
Yuj chi' a in Dios Yajal in svak' in ti' to ol ex vak'canoch d'a yol sk'ab' chamel, axo chamel chi' ol ex pechan b'eyek'oc, ol ex cham yuuj.
Ol vak'can tz'inan lum tzalquixtac Seir chi', manhxo ol in cha ek' anima ta'.
Ol vak'can b'ud'joc el lum tzalquixtac, lum ch'olquixtac yed' yoltac a a' yuj snivanil eb' chamnac, aton eb' ol cham d'a oval.
Junelnhej ol vak'can tz'inan lum e luum chi', manhxalaj mach olto cajnajcan d'a e chonhab' chi'. Icha chi' ol aj eyojtacaneli to a in ton Jehová in svutej icha chi'.
A ex tic eyojtac to a in Jehová in ayinek' yed' eb' israel tic, palta tzeyalan icha tic: A smacb'en Israel yed' Judá, quic ol ajcanoc, xe comon chiej.

Palta a in Dios Yajal in svak' in ti' to icha val yoval e k'ool yed' e chichonk'olal ayoch d'a Israel tic, icha pax chi' ol ex vutej. Icha chi' ol aj snachajel yuj eb' israel to a in svak'och eyaelal yuj tas ix eyutej eb'.

Icha chi' ol aj eyojtacaneli to a in Jehová in ix vab' val e b'uchval lolonel ayic ix eyalan icha tic: A lum tzalquixtac d'a yol smacb'en Israel, ix can val tz'inan luum. Co maquec quiquej luum, xe chi.
Ix eyik' val chaanh e b'a d'ayin, ix in e b'uchani, palta ix vab'nhej tas ix eyal chi'.
A in Dios Yajal in sval juntzanh tic: Masanil yolyib'anhq'uinal tic ol tzalajq'ueoc ayic ol ex in satanel chi'.

Yujto a ex tic, ix ex te tzalaji ayic ix lajviel chonhab' Israel, yuj chi' ol in pactzitej d'ayex icha ix eyutej e b'a chi'. Ol vak'can tz'inan lum tzalquixtac Seir chi', aton e macb'en ex yinhtilalcan Edom. Icha chi' ol aj eyojtacaneli to a in ton Jehová in svutej icha chi', xchi Jehová, xa chi d'a eb', xchi d'ayin.
